about_the_game:
WARLANCER Armored Survivor is a single player top down shooter where you play as a freelancing mercenary completing capture and bounty missions while fighting of endless waves of alien invaders.

As your chosen weapon levels up, you gain access to the ability to equip another weapon to that weapon, allowing the first weapon to fire the second weapon on hit. Chain multiple weapons together to unleash untold levels of destruction.

Features

  • Incremental level up / upgrade system with multiple weapons

  • Temporary field powerups

  • Map objectives

  • Ion Cannons and Bigass Drills

WARLANCER Armored Survivor is currently free to play; simply join the open playtest and you can download the game at no cost. If you enjoyed the game, please help complete the in game survey at the end game screen. It would mean the world to us. Thanks!

Recently completed is the elite enemy system, which has stronger singular enemies appearing at regular intervals. On defeat, these enemies grant credits which can be spent on randomised weapons at shops and drop containers granting the player a selection of randomised stat boosts which are integral to completing the game.
